website_summaries.verdict: The manufacturer recommends using it only with CND Vinylux polish, but reviewers report amazing results with other brands of nail polish, too. Most love it, although some say it does not work for those with soft, brittle nails.
pros: Exposure to light strengthens the coat
Extends most manicures and pedicures to at least a week without scratching
cons: Takes a long time to dry
Age and get gummy in the bottle sooner than expected
Black bottle makes it hard to see how much is left

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste time reading reviews
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste time reading reviews. Just. Buy. It. I have not a single complaint. My nail polish is still going strong and it's been 12 days.
customer_reviews.author: CoB

customer_reviews.title: The best topcoat for lasting polish
customer_reviews.text: I have tried just about every topcoat and this is the best by far for getting nail polish to stay longer. I have found it works well with most nail polish brands, not just Vinylux. How to: clean and prep nails, apply base coat (I use OPI), apply 2 coats nail polish, allow to mostly dry, apply 1-2 coats vinylux. Reapply every couple days to help mani or pedi last. I can usually get polish to last for 6-8 days with this when nails are well prepared. It's also very shiny, which makes nails look extra beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic top coat!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing my own manicures for years and I typically used “Out the door” brand top coat but recently I was recommended to CND Vinylux and so far I LOVE IT way more than my previous brand!! I applied CND Vinylux six days ago and I currently have Invisalign trays in my mouth that I have to pop out every time I eat or drink hot items and that can be pretty rough on my nails and has caused chipping before. After 6 days with this top coat I only have two tiny chips. I am more than satisfied with the strength of this polish! 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Strawbabies017

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting top coat that will save money on your manicures
customer_reviews.text: I received this product quickly and the quality meets the price. The product description recommends only using with the same brand. However, I get a long lasting, salon quality manicure when used over any nail polish brand.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Dries Quickly, Chips Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with CND Vinylux Weekly Nail Polish. It dries quickly and has a nice shiny appearance. I've redone my nails twice so far with the combination of polishes and they are chipping on the second day. I'm ok with slight chipping maybe on the third day, but this is coming away from the edges and chipping much quicker than expected. I wouldn't purchase again. I've used a different top coat by this brand previously and did not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay D

customer_reviews.title: BEST long wearing polish and topcoat ever
customer_reviews.text: My hands are dry because they are always getting washed (no flu thank you!), folding laundry, cleaning house, etc. I have tried Essie's no-light gel couture polish and top coat and it didn't last, much as I love Essie polish and their Good To Go top coat. I tried OPI long lasting polish set too (primer, polish, and top coat). Again - didn't hold up. Then I tried CND Vinylux polish and top coat - and I can go a full week before having to give myself a manicure. I do have to use acetone to remove, but that makes sense given how well it holds to the nail. No complaints from me. Love this line.
customer_reviews.author: Vorareader

customer_reviews.title: Helps nail polish not chip
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite for an at home make over! Just put on your nail polish no first coat necessary and then put this on top of any polish. I can usually get 4-6 days wear before it chips. This includes washing dishes and bathing kids
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: All time fav brand! Just trust me... this is every bit of a week long polish... I’m right handed... so I’ll post a pic of my right hand polished with three coats of color and on top coat. Just the slightest wear on the very edges and I’m hard on my hands!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE Vinylux!
customer_reviews.text: Love Vinylux! I was trained on this nail polish in my academy and it honestly is bang for your buck! It lasts so long and easy to apply with their new brushes. My Mouther-In-Law usually cannot wear regular nail polish; only shellac. I had a final I had to do so she came in for me to get regular polish, usually it’ll chip and just peel off entirely when she wears it (she’s a crasher and basher) but it actually stayed on for awhile and I was even impressed. Since then I recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Best nail top coat ever
customer_reviews.text: Best nail top coat ever.Keeps nail polish on perfect like gel polish for a week to two weeks, For real. I wash my hands constantly because i work in health care and we are not allowed to have gel nails. All nailpolish must be removable in a minute to prove we don't have gel nails. This stuff looks just like gel and fools everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie doll 7

customer_reviews.title: Really does last up to a week!
customer_reviews.text: First time using this product and I am pleased. While I usually go to my beauty shop for shellac manicures I was forced to find another polish due to covid 19 lockdowns. The product is not quite as shiny as my regular shellac it is a nice satin/shiny finish but best of all it wears without peeling for almost a week! It removes quite easily as well. I will use again with a ridge filler first. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BookLady

customer_reviews.title: Natural nail polish
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this product by my hair stylist. Having had damage to my nails with gel polish and dip powder, I was searching for a way to heal my nails and yet have a pretty manicure. CND Vinylux has been just the ticket! I love the colors and long wear. Use colors without a base coat on clean and dry nails. Two coats of color, then two coats of the clear and you are set! I generally change my nail color every 5-7 days and this is chip free and super shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Shireen S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last a week
customer_reviews.text: I used a coat CND sticky base coat, 2 coats of vinylux polish, and a coat vinylux top coat and after 2 days one nail has already chipped. I love the vinylux colour and am hard on my hands, so can't be too hard on it, but it does say it's a weekly polish and top coat. The chip on the nail is small, but it's there. The other nails are holding up beautifully after 3 days. I love the fact that this dries so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: khaosstar

customer_reviews.title: Turned nails brown
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this one but within 3 days of wear, my blue-ish nail polish (same brand) turned brown. The attached picture was the result of me removing the top coat with nail polish remover. I figured maybe it was a fluke and tried again with an Essie white (blanc) and within 2 days, it had too started to brown (as pictured). Not to mention, my nails are already chipping. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle P

customer_reviews.title: Started out good
customer_reviews.text: I started out loving this top coat. But, I noticed that this top coat leaves bubbles all over my nail, under the top coat when it dries. It also leaves a texture and doesn't look smooth after drying. I often have to put on another top coat to try and make it smooth. Sometimes it works, most times it doesn't. Disappointed after reading all the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Great top coat
customer_reviews.text: Can not believe this! Been a week and no chips on nails, more than regular use, (I am a nurse so I wash my hands frequently) Reapplied once because I wanted the shine. Gets lots of compliments and asked if my nails are gel. Have not tried to remove them since I have to reason to yet. Maybe when I will want a new color :)
customer_reviews.author: Nursing101

customer_reviews.title: Oh wow
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to longevity, but I'm so impressed I had to write a review. I managed to get to 30 years old without ever learning to paint my nails without getting it all over my skin. I don't know why, but this was so much easier to use than anything I've tried before. The color is also very vibrant and the top coat gives an awesome shine. I never write reviews but wow.
customer_reviews.author: Jamila

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Shiny, and Smooth Nails
customer_reviews.text: Best top coat ever in my opinion (even better than Seche Vite because after a couple uses the top coat gets sticky and hard to apply). As for CND’s top coat, the brush is thick, making it very easy to apply with just one stroke! Leaves your nails looking sleek, shiny, and smooth. Definitely recommend buying this top coat.
customer_reviews.author: ac3986

customer_reviews.title: Nail polish does not chip!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It dries fast, and it's a nice thick layer (but not like a bad one). These are my nails after 2 weeks, and I cook, clean, and do dishes, and my nails haven't chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: If you love nail polish, you need this top coat. It even works with regular (non Vinylux brand) nail polish. It dries to a gel like shine and dries very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ESQ.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come off!
customer_reviews.text: My manicurist highly encouraged me to use this as it lasts longer. Unfortunately it chipped within a day or two, and then I had a terrible time getting it off! AND, no returns, so I'm giving it to her to use on her clients. Maybe she has a special product to remove it, but it took me a LONG time and A LOT of rubbing to get this stuff off!
customer_reviews.author: Gardenkat

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Was hard to apply evenly bc it was so thick, but dried very thin and flaky. It only lasted a day. Looks super cheap. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anne C

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed Whatsoever..
customer_reviews.text: I used it twice and threw it away. Its nearly impossible to get off, you must soak for a long time. It peels off better than it does trying to be removed with nail polish remover. It yellowed way to quickly. It is not any shiny-er or stronger or last longer than your average top coat. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni & Ray

customer_reviews.title: It chipped in a day
customer_reviews.text: Pros: it dries quickly, has a high shine to it once it dries that definitely reminds me of gels. Cons: it lasted on my nail ONE day... I'll stick to wearing gels on my nails and regular nail polish with this top coat on my toes. I don't dislike it it's just probably not for me. I see this working for someone who doesn't do daily cooking, dish washing and work around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a bunch of other polish and top coats and this is by far the best I have found. The topcoat is the only one I've found that can even make it through washing dishes. When using CND Vinylux nail polish with this top coat, I've found my nails grow out faster than the polish chips. It is definitely harder to remove than other polishes but it's worth it. Every other polish + top coat I've tried has ended up chipping within a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this crap!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried applied it twice and both times it peeled off within a couple hours. I can't return this cheap quality polish so I a very upset. Cheap Walmart polish stays on longer! Trust me and don't waste your money on this polish.
customer_reviews.author: LMP

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I use this Top coat for a very long time, its an amazing product. But last week I purchased with this company and they delivered a DANDRUFF SHAMPOO, yes it makes no sense and i tried to return and its no refundable. So ended up going to CVS and buying the top coat and i am stuck with a shampoo that i am never going to use it.🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Cinthya

customer_reviews.title: Peels off day one
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the worst. It dries super fast, but that's it's one good quality. Has peeled off the first day all 3 times I have tried it. I asked myself if this was user error, but after trying multiple times I'm thinking, I am a scientist and this stuff clearly sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: Better than Shellac!
customer_reviews.text: Life changing formula!!! This top coat goes on thick and leaves a high shine. Make sure to get the ends of your nails to seal in the manicure. With this top coat I am able to get 5-7 days of chip free manicure. For people like me who are constantly washing their hands and having their hands in dish water, going more than a day without chipping seems like a miracle. I've had multiple shellac manicures that didn't last as long or look as good as Vinylux. I would recommend this to anyone who has problems keeping their manicure fresh.
customer_reviews.author: J Zilinski

customer_reviews.title: Feels like Salon quality!
customer_reviews.text: This top coat has changed the game for doing my nails at home! I was first introduced to it by a friend who gifted me a bottle, and I didn't think much of it. I have lots of other drug store clear top coats. But the CND long wear top coat will let my nails last for almost two weeks without a chip. It goes on thick almost like a gel. The thicker I put it on the better it stays and they turn out so shiny. I bought all the ladies in my family one for Christmas! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If you do your own nails, this stuff is worth every penny. I paint my nails Sunday night, and the manicure lasts until the following Sunday. You can use the top coat on any polish and it works. Compared to the 2 days or so that other top coats last, the 7 I get out of this is a dream. I don't have the sticky base coat yet, but I'll try it at some point. This stuff works so well on its own that I haven't had to add other things to my routine. Happy polishing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stop chips
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all. In fact, I think it accelerated How badly my nails chip! Save your money —-don’t buy it. And Amazon won’t refund or return it because nail polishes are flammable liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth for $10,00 I used to have the one before that version, the one that really lasts 10 days or less, but this one for me on the second day staring to peeling already! Not buying this anymore, I was going to return but this item can’t be returned!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: This is my third bottle of this top coat as I do not waste my time with any basic polishes- OPI
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of the CND Vinylux products. This top coat dries quickly and allows the base color to remain chip free for almost a week on my fingers and for several weeks on my toes. This is my third bottle of this top coat as I do not waste my time with any basic polishes- OPI, Essie, Zoya, Butter, Ciate, Deborah Lippmann, etc. I will say that the new Essie gel couture is similar, but the color options are subpar to CND Vinylux in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: AustinJCollins

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I have a favorite color of nail polish, but sadly it chips easily. I bought this top coat and wow, what a difference. I am blown away by how good this polish is. Just buy it you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela  Reyes-Holmes

customer_reviews.title: So good you have to at least try it
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the holy grail of top coats! Used it with CND sticky base and my regular OPI polish lasts 6-7 days without a problem. The picture of this on day 7 says it all. Note: I re-apply every 2 days. My nails grows so quickly that gel doesn’t make sense but I need a good top coat to make regular polish last 1 week. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: JWA

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your hone manicure
customer_reviews.text: My polish always chipped no matter what brand I used until I found this. It really does make you think you have a coat of vinyl on your nails making them strong and protecting your polish. Makes mine last a lot Longer
customer_reviews.author: T Rod

customer_reviews.title: Love this product line.
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this polish when I went for one of my rare manicures, and the tech highly recommended it. I loved it and it DID stay on for 5 days, even though my hands are in water a lot. I bought this myself on Amazon (color Lobster Roll + topcoat) and am reordering in another color. The polish seems to go a long way but seems like I use up the top coat faster. I love it-used to use OPI, which also lasted a long time, and sometimes I switch off to OPI, but do love this Vinyl product line. Highly recommend plus, comes off easily with regular remover.
customer_reviews.author: jerseygirl

customer_reviews.title: Fast drying, shiny topcoat
customer_reviews.text: I believe the topcoat I received was a new formula as the packaging and bottle look different from the one in my salon. The top coat was much easier to apply thn the Vinylux polish and it leaves a nice shine on the polish. I found this to be very fast to dry which is definitely a plus. Only downside is the price but if my polish doesn’t chip, it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: FindersKeepers

customer_reviews.title: From the reviews I expected more
customer_reviews.text: I bought this top coat after hearing rave reviews. I used it on top of a Nails Inc nail polish. I'm not impressed. It chipped after 2 days, same as any other top coat that isn't a gel polish/top coat. It dries nicely, it doesn't bubble.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Adds beautiful shine!
customer_reviews.text: During the pandemic and not going to a salon this is great for keeping nails chip free for a week. Especially as much as we’re washing our hands these days. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: PerfectStranger

customer_reviews.title: LIFECHANGING for using on kids
customer_reviews.text: I have tried for months to find a system to keep nail polish on my daughter's fingernails for longer than a few hours. This lasted for nearly a week with very little chipping. LIFE CHANGING. Paired with two coats of the the CND vinylux long wear polish.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: When I would get a manicure at my local nail salon the technician would always use this top coat. I asked what brand it was and she told me CND. I now use this when I paint my own nails. It is super shiny and makes my polish last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Joana

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I used Essie Gel Setter top coat for years. I recently purchased this and it’s easily comparable but I’d argue it’s better! Very durable and keeps my manicure fresh for days which is hard to do! (I work hard with my hands)
customer_reviews.author: Bailey B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I thought this would be a lot stronger and last longer than regular nail polish, judging by the name...vinylux. But in two days it was already chipping off. Plus the color was not what I expected, so I bought a second color and I didn’t like it either! So approximately $30 wasted. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sallycorn

customer_reviews.title: Very shiny finish
customer_reviews.text: I already have a top coat that I love (Opi) so I use this one to add shine to a 2-3 day old manicure. It does the trick! The Opi top coat gives my mani longevity and this one adds amazing shine.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter introduced me to CND Vinylux--it is like gel nails but so much easier to apply and remove. My polish lasts at least a week--usually more. No chipping at all. And helps my nails to stay strong and grow better. This stuff is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Peels off the next day.
customer_reviews.text: Peels off the next day. I even tried to use it as a top coat on regular polish and it did the same thing. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Last a good weeks+. I had one short nail that has a problem, so I reapplied to that nail every 3 days or so. Help the nail grow out.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzard

customer_reviews.title: RUINED MY NAILS FOR WEEKS AND WEEKS.
customer_reviews.text: My nails are STILL peeling after using this and the polish on my hands. Vinylux works beautifully on my toes but not so much on my hands! YIKES!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good as the CND super shiny topcoat!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used CND super shiny topcoat for years and have always loved it. I thought I’d try this one based on the reviews and was really disappointed. It doesn’t look nearly as shiny and it chipped within 2 days whereas the super shiny topcoat lasts about week and looks like a professional manicure due to the shine. I ended up just throwing this one out since I couldn’t return it and bought more of the super shiny. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I purchased a couple of the Vinylux colors to use with this topcoat, and I am stunned that it really does work. I can do housework, dishes, etc, and my hands still look like I just got a manicure. I have tossed out all my old polishes, and am slowly building a new collection of vinylux colors. When you find something that works, it's so satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: hours of enjoyment...keeps me on my toes.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for at least 4-5 days on a working woman
customer_reviews.text: Very nice top coat with great glossy shine. My nails will last 4-5 days then I do get chips just at the tips of my nails. Much improved from a normal top coat that I may only make it one day without a chip. Easy to remove with normal nail polish remover. I use any nail polish I already own ( including OPI, Essie, Zoya) and it works with all of them. Very pleased. I never expect any non-light gel to last 10 days. Not on this working girl!
customer_reviews.author: anyavix

customer_reviews.title: Love CND!
customer_reviews.text: The CND products last a long time and go on smoothly. I love them. Wish they were less expensive but they're worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Catgetsdown

customer_reviews.title: Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product. It’s thick and you have to use a lot to not pull it too much. Dries quick under air dryer and feels good on. Maybe I’ll try thinning it out a bit next time.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Not a Holy Grail Topcoat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the Vinylux color Fuax Fur, and I saw tipwear after the first day. It was much worse on the second day, and then chips were all over on the third day. I had been looking forward to this system, as I have naturally weak, peely nails which I keep strong with my usual nail care and polish routine. This felt pretty light to wear very well, but I thought maybe it was super-flexible, which would cause it to adhere to nails well. Whatever the reason, this didn't work for me. I have hundreds (I know) of polishes, and I am no novice; this stuff just didn't work on my nails.
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST POLISH I HAVE EVERY WORN
customer_reviews.text: I AM 88 YRS OLE AND HAVE USED FINGER NAIL POLISH ALL MY LIFE AND THIS IS BY FAR THE BEST. I WEAR IT EVERYDAY. I WEAR THE OVERCOAT AND THE COLOR POLISH. TRY IT, YOU WILL LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: SMILING

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Top coat peels right off , terrible. Threw it away. Upset that I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: best polish i've ever used
customer_reviews.text: i like the vinylux more than the shellac. it dries quickly, and is much easier to remove. the only thing is that the matching vinylux/shellac don't match. i tend to like the shellac color more. these cnd polishes are terrific! i've had artificial nails for 30+years, so i know polish, and this is the best. i removed my artificial nails about 6 months ago, and have been using this on my thin, brittle nails. my nails have grown out without breaking. amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: flowerchild

customer_reviews.title: Excellent top coat for use on Vinylux nail polish
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of Vinylux nail polish. This is the top coat that seals in the color. When I go for a pedi, my salon uses this polish, and it really lasts. I am now doing my own manis with this product. I refresh the topcoat every 4 or 5 days. Works great on keeping my pedi nice. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Flossygirl

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for shine and to increase the longevity of my polish. Sadly, this product made no difference. Disappointed, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen  Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Just one of many...
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be the magic solution to maintaining a manicure and polish. For me, it is not. Using CND polish, two coats, I then applied this top coat. Reading reviews, many cited a sticky base coat as a panacea. This process is already a thick amalgamation of products! This top coat comes in a black bottle and you cannot see how much is left. Perhaps the black bottle protects the product. All in all, nothing special for this set of nails!
customer_reviews.author: An Educated Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Do not believe item was new - very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Item came in slightly damaged box with scotch tape on the top and bottom of box - definitely not original seal. Very disappointed I paid full price for what appears to be a used product.
customer_reviews.author: JenAnn

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Thin & doesn’t keep the CND paint from lasting more than 4 days for me. I’ve tried following directions numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: USA Native

customer_reviews.title: Longest Lasting Top Coat I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of Vinylux Top Coat. I completely used one bottle and loved it so much that I have purchased a second bottle. When used with CND nail polish I find that my polish lasts anywhere from 5 to 7 days. I get 5 days wear when I am doing lots of yard work or swimming on a daily basis and 7 days when swimming and doing less yard work. I recommend wiping your nails alcohol before beginning to polish.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Fay Morris

customer_reviews.title: my nails look like I had JUST HAD A NEW MANICURE
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks after my manicure (with CND "Lobster Pot Red") I apply a coat of this....and BELIEVE ME...my nails look like I had JUST HAD A NEW MANICURE!!!....Truly, people go out of their way to mention the shine of this product! It's..really AMAZING!! A FUNNY, BUT TYPICAL happening last Saturday......I was REALLY At "RED LOBSTER"...waiting for my take-out order....when a woman tapped me on my shoulder to COMPLIMENT me on my BEAUTIFUL NAIL POLISH LUSTRE! (THE TRUTH!!! ....and, I was wearing "Lobster Pot" Red!..:) !
customer_reviews.author: Margot Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Did not apply to nail well at all. Was ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not apply to nail well at all. Was very thick and air bubbles would appear on the nail. You need to work fast and cannot do back and do more than one brushstroke to spread out across nail evenly. Do not buy. I use the polishes without the top coat and they last just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Just, YES.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything.... I am not kidding. Every topcoat known to man has been purchased by me... I even tried to use my own gel kit. Out of every single thing I have tried this top coat has rocked my world!! I work with kids everyday; I open play doh weekly; I open backpacks daily. This coat does not crack!! I can get upwards of 5 to 7 days of no chipping. That's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Quick dry topcoat that prolongs the life of your manicure.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite top coat ever! Quick dry and helps polish last. I apply each day for three days after my manicure.
customer_reviews.author: deborah fore

customer_reviews.title: Did not last even close to a week
customer_reviews.text: Writing this for my mom, who I ordered this for: This top coat did not protect my manicure at all. After only two days, my nail polish was chipping and wearing as if I did not use anything to protect it. After getting a manicure, I also refrain from doing dishes or anything that would damage the manicure for at least a few days. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hen

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the vinylux weekly gold blue colored polish. This stuff lasted an entire week and only chipped a small corner on one nail.So awesome I will def be buying more colors. The polish didn't dull and stayed shiny and fresh all week! No chipping other than the one nail. If you dont know how this stuff works you paint 2 coats of the weekly color of your choice and then the top coat. The top coat hardens with natural light and gets stronger the longer you wear it. I was skeptical but it really works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Lasts Unless You Can Cure It with UV
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it is worth the money. Sally Hansen lasted longer. Bought by mistake. Was trying to get the Shellac needing UV which is good. CND Vinylux - No. CND Shellac-Yes.
customer_reviews.author: PDT

customer_reviews.title: Empty bottle!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. Received a empty bottle of this nail polish!
customer_reviews.author: Juan B.

customer_reviews.title: I first learned about this at a nail salon I ...
customer_reviews.text: I first learned about this at a nail salon I visited while out of town and bought this for use at my usual salon back home. It keeps polish looking fresh and helps prevent chipping and peeling longer than any other top coat I have tried. It can be hard to remove with nail polish remover, but it's worth it to save my manicure just a few days longer than normal.
customer_reviews.author: E. H. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Shellac alternative
customer_reviews.text: I am very hard on my nails/hands at work. I also loath chipped and peeling polish. This is a great product for both of these. The polish stays fresh looking for a good week. I have only had better results with salon shellacs. This is more convenient and definitely cheaper. Works just like regular polish and topcoat. Dries very fast! No more waking up with blanket marks on the nails you did before bed ;-) Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and was recommended by the nail salon I go to. It extends the life of my mani/pedis. It’s somewhat difficult to remove but that’s the whole point
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on long at all
customer_reviews.text: It does not last even when paired with same brand color polish or by itself as a clear coat.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Yarborough

customer_reviews.title: Pair it with CND Sticky Base Coat
customer_reviews.text: When I use the CND sticky base coat and this one as the top coat, my manicure last 2 weeks. And it all comes off easily with nail polish remover. Perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: debs11

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My occupation requires I was my hands numerous times a day. This top coat keeps my polish on for a week. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: C.m.k.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent topcoat, very durable, very shiny
customer_reviews.text: Best topcoat I’ve ever found, very durable, very shiny. Works really well with vinyl Lux colors, but you can use it with any polish.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: I am a nail polish connaisseur. I despise chipped nail polish, so I am always searching for the perfect top coat. This one is great when combined with CND's Sticky Base Coat. Some reviews said it works well with cheaper nail polishes also, but I am picky about my polish brands. I only use Zoya and Avon. I occasionally use OPI, but find that their quality has deteriorated over the past few years.
customer_reviews.author: Thomasina

customer_reviews.title: Nurse (follow up to come)
customer_reviews.text: I just applied this polish (top coat) for the first time and was already impressed. I will follow up on more soon! I am a nurse and have issues with any and all polish/gel/dip etc. "Long wear" never looks the same after even one shift. I am very excited for this polish and already love the gel look, quick dry, and shine!
customer_reviews.author: Silke

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes this hard to find nail polish and top coat. After going to a few stores, decided to order on line. No more chasing around
customer_reviews.author: William J Carfagno

customer_reviews.title: love this-works really well
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works awesome...even over regular nail polish. Mine only lasts about 4-5 days before it starts to peel/wear off at the tips, but that is better than anything else I have tried. I bought this with the vinylux nail polish...they are good quality and put a thick-gel like coating over your nails, without having to use the uv light and special gel polishes. Overall, very happy with it...not much more than regular nail polish costs at the store, much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna H

customer_reviews.title: Best top coat in today's market
customer_reviews.text: If used with CND vinylux polish, your mani will last 2-3 days before chipping at the tips, not a week like they advertise. I;ve used this as a top coat with other brands and types of polish/lacquer and it works well with all of them. It dries fast, gives your nails a wet, glossy look, and prevents chipping longer than any other type of top coat I've ever used. This is currently the best top coat on the market that's available for non-professionals.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Using CND Vinyl Lux honestly prolonged my manicure by 5+ days. No chips. I am hard on my hands, usually have them chipping within 3 days. This product lives up to its promise!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Top Coat At An Exceptional Price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this top coat over ANY polish. Just seems to make my polish last longer without chipping . I think CND is so well know for their Shellac that it is overlooked for regular polish. I have use the Vinylux polish and I was not impressed but this top coat is a real winner. I have used over many different polishes from Korres to Chanel and always loved it. It will not wear like a UV or Led cured lacquer but does well.
customer_reviews.author: Sally B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome when you use 2 thick coats over your polish!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd bottle of top coat. This stuff is amazing! I will say that I put on 2 very thick coats of this top coat over my polish to really seal it in. I think that helps it last longer. So far my polish lasts easily 7 days. Sometimes even longer! I highly recommend this top coat. I even sometimes will put it over regular polish and it works!
customer_reviews.author: ABranham

customer_reviews.title: Works and Shiny !!️
customer_reviews.text: This is the Best hardening polish I’ve ever found. My thin peeling nails look better than they ever have. Friends have noticed how nice my manicure looks. Highly recommend.!!️
customer_reviews.author: sharehawaii

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: The best top coat I’ve bought in a while. I’m trying to get away from doing shellac too often and this product has made it super easy. My mani/pedi lasts up to a week which is unusual for regular polish
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Good, used over regular mail polish
customer_reviews.text: Used over my normal mail polish and the hold was pretty good. It lasted at least a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Zeleney

customer_reviews.title: Lasts! Wonderful shine.
customer_reviews.text: This top coat lasts a long time with a nice shine. This is now my favorite top coat ever.
customer_reviews.author: VRCJ

customer_reviews.title: 1-2 week manicures
customer_reviews.text: This Nail Polish is BOMB! I get 1-2 weeks out of a manicure I do myself at home... unheard of!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Great pro looking top coat
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent top coat. I use with all brands of nail polish and can double the life of my manicure if I apply this again after a few days. It gives a very glossy gel like look to nail polishes. Dries quickly and smoothly. It does tend to get thick after a while but a new bottle is still way cheaper than a professional manicure.
customer_reviews.author: CeeZee

customer_reviews.title: Not that great....
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of the Vinylux line overall, but I don't like the top coat that much. It is not super shiny or quick-dry. Most times I feel like I need two coats in order for it to dry shiny, but then I risk it going on too thick. I will continue my search for a shiny, quick-dry top coast that doesn't shrink polish (at this point I don't know if it exists!)
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB.

customer_reviews.title: My longwear topcoat cheat
customer_reviews.text: I use this on top of all my nail polishes to keep them from chipping and looking shiny longer. It really does extend my polishes and creates a smooth finish.
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: Great top coat
customer_reviews.text: I’m rough in my nails but this top coat really helps my mani last a week or longer!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your time reading the reviews. Buy this now. Your nail polish will last a long time. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and uneven
customer_reviews.text: Too thick so difficult to apply. I tried it for a few manicures and itlasted well enough but did not look smooth.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieK

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Didnt last long before it started to chip; maybe old product. I chose this because my nail tech uses this product but it last alot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

product_meta.title: CND Vinylux Long Wear Top Coat , 0.5 fluid ounce
product_meta.description:
Vinylux weekly polish and weekly top coat are a system that is uniquely design to work together. Patent-pending pro-light technology creates a powerful network of cross-linked polymer bonds that build resistance to chips, and enhance durability with exposure to natural light over time.

BRAND STORY
Creative Nail Design, Inc. (CND) is the global leader in professional nail, hand and foot beauty – including SHELLAC Brand 14+ Day Nail Color.
